childMarkdownRemark.html:
How to receive ERC-20 tokens

You can receive any ERC20 token by simply sending it to your Ethereum address (thatÂ´s the one starting with "0x....").

If the token is not in our default token list, you will need to add it as a custom token first.

Please do NOT send your tokens to the token contract address, or you might lose them forever.
